original_text: Thus Zimri destroyed all the house of Baasha, according to the word of the Lord, which he spoke against Baasha by Jehu the prophet,
korean_text: 바아사의 온 집을 멸하였는데 선지자 예후를 통하여 바아사를 꾸짖어 하신 여호와의 말씀 같이 되었으니

sentences.original_text: Thus Zimri destroyed all the house of Baasha,
sentences.korean_translation: 이에 심리는 바아사의 온 집안을 멸망시켰으니

sentences.original_text: according to the word of the Lord,
